title: FS: NEW Lot of 11 Low Grade T207 w/ some tougher commons

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Lot of 11 Low Grade T207 w/ some tougher commons
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T207 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly lower grade cards as the scans will show but they are all presentable and a few of them are tougher commons. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (Removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Crandall - $14
Gainor - $15
Latham - $20
Livingston (Small "C" On Shirt) SGC 10 - $50
Wiltse PSA 1 - $18
